content.text:
[Chords]
[ch]Cmaj7[/ch] x3200x
[ch]Bm7[/ch]   x2023x
[ch]Am7[/ch]   x0201x
[ch]Em7[/ch]   02203x

[Intro]
[ch]Cmaj7[/ch] [ch]Bm7[/ch]
         How 'bout you?
[ch]Am7[/ch]              [ch]Em7[/ch]
   How 'bout you?

[Verse 1]
            [ch]Cmaj7[/ch]
You took my love for granted
            [ch]Bm7[/ch]
You left me lost and disenchanted
             [ch]Am7[/ch]
Bulldozed my heart as if you planned it
              [ch]Em7[/ch]
My prince was so unjustly handsome

[Pre-Chorus]
[ch]Cmaj7[/ch]
Who was the knight in shining armor?
[ch]Bm7[/ch]
I could've sworn you'd love me harder
[ch]Am7[/ch]
Might as well down this Caymus bottle
[ch]Em7[/ch]
I ain't the type to play the martyr

[Chorus]
              [ch]Cmaj7[/ch]             [ch]Bm7[/ch]
How 'bout you get the fuck out?
              [ch]Am7[/ch]               [ch]Em7[/ch]
How 'bout you get the fuck out? Get the fuck out
                [ch]Cmaj7[/ch]
(How 'bout you) take your things and be on your merry way
    [ch]Bm7[/ch]
Fly off with a wink, bye bye baby
                 [ch]Am7[/ch]
(How 'bout you) scusami, Mimi'll call you a valet
           [ch]Em7[/ch]
(You just) take your things and be on your merry way

[Verse 2]
               [ch]Cmaj7[/ch]
My friends all saw it in your eyes
             [ch]Bm7[/ch]
They told me once, they told me twice
           [ch]Am7[/ch]
I looked beyond all the signs
              [ch]Em7[/ch]
I guess false love makes you blind, ay

[Pre-Chorus]
[ch]Cmaj7[/ch]
Who was the knight in shining armor?(You, you, you)
[ch]Bm7[/ch]
I could've sworn you'd love me harder(You, you, you)
[ch]Am7[/ch]
Might as well down this Caymus bottle(You, you, you)
[ch]Em7[/ch]
I ain't the type to play the martyr

[Chorus]
              [ch]Cmaj7[/ch]                        [ch]Bm7[/ch]

[ch]Em[/ch]                [ch]Am7[/ch]
Én is hajtottam a sikerért,

ott volt a szívemen.

s nyújtotta kezét,

  [ch]F#6[/ch]      [ch]Fm[/ch]     [ch]Bsus2[/ch]

[ch]Em[/ch]                     [ch]Am7[/ch]

[ch]Em[/ch]                       [ch]Am[/ch]

[ch]Ebm[/ch]               [ch]F#[/ch]         [ch]Bbm[/ch]

ha nem kenyérre kér,

Szórd a széllel szét magad,
